::KitKat::

As she slept with her head propt on her hand in the lab, she dreamed.
She dreamed that she was in battle, she saw Megatron firing on 
Drillbit.  She saw Drillbit get hit and fall.  She shot at Megatron 
and then Megatron blew up into a million pieces.  She ran over to 
Drillbit, but he was dead. She held his body in her arm and cried. 
She picked him up and took him to the base.  While walking she heard 
a loud noise.  She turned to see what it was....

Her head fell out of her hand and she jerked up. She looked around 
and saw that she was in the lab. She breathed a deep sigh of relief. 
"Oh thank the matrix, it was only a dream."
She looked at the console.  Te computer was still working on the 
spark.
